BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to enact and the President to sign S.1872/H.R.3423, the Achieving a Better Life Experience (ABLE) Act of 2011, which amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the tax treatment of ABLE accounts established under State programs for the care of family members with disabilities, and for other purposes.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Congress to enact and the President to sign S.1872/H.R.3423, the Achieving a Better Life Experience (ABLE) Act of 2011.
